mapper.select: SELECT user_id, product_id, quantity, create_date, modify_date FROM cart WHERE product_id=#{productId} AND user_id=#{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cart WHERE user_id=#{userId}

SELECT c.product_id, p.name as productName, p.description as description, p.use_yn as productUseYn, c.quantity, p.price, c.create_date FROM cart c LEFT OUTER JOIN product p ON c.product_id=p.product_id WHERE user_id=#{userId}
